summary: This Mod makes a real icy Horse out of the boring Frost from the Promises to Keep quest.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/29355-2-1357210711.png[/img]

[center][color=SlateGray]
I ever thought that a unique horse like Frost, should be more unique and powerfull than ordinary horses. So I made this Mod.

_________________________________________________________________________________________

New Features:[/color]
[list]
[*]Icy Dust around the Horse
[*]Essential
[*]Powerfull Frostattacks
[*]Waterwalking
[*]Doesn't flies directly
[/list]
[color=SlateGray]
_________________________________________________________________________________________


Mods I recommend with this Mod:[/color]
[list]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14950]Convenient Horses[/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20741]PINEAPPLEVISION ENBs[/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10579]Better Horses[/url]
[/list]

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/29355-4-1357210712.png[/img]
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/29355-5-1357210712.png[/img]
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/29355-1-1357210710.png[/img]


[color=6D9910]Don't forget to[/color]
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/6794-1-1357291115.png[/img]


[color=Navy]
Special thanks to Slof for his unique Frost Mod and mitchalek for his Blaze of Eventide that inspired me to make this Mod.
[/color][/center]
author: Trestor
